entry.title: OnlyBuck
entry.summary:
Author: Spacers24

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,491Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 207

Summary: (previously named CamBuck) When Buck finds himself low on fund after the lawsuit, his brilliant Idea to get more money is to open an onlyfans, keeping his identity a secret. Eddie stumbles upon his Onlyfans one night and discover Buck real identity next morning. Thus start Eddie Diaz quest to try and control himself around Buck, while the rest of the 118 is dragged along for the ride.

entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,655Chapters: 8/12Kudos: 47

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something – anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up.

entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 331,466Chapters: 35/55Kudos: 353

Summary: “Does this change a thing between us?” Buck asks, his voice low, hands still framing Eddie’s face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie’s lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck’s mouth like it’s the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie’s fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. “I don’t know.” It’s not a yes—Buck’s not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it’s so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. “Alright,” Buck exhales, nodding like it’s nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie’s mouth in his again. They don’t stop. Can’t. Their mouths are locked together like they’re trying to breathe each other in, like letting go for even a second would be unbearable.or; Eddie’s shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior… or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.title: Grind With Me
entry.summary:
Author: ne0nc0ast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,532Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: Buck looks around, “Where’d Rav go? I thought he’d be with you?” Eddie scoffs and looks back at Buck. “Yeah, well it seems like I’m the only one who’s not ‘letting loose’ tonight,” he says with air quotes. Buck frowns and gets that crinkle in his forehead. “What the hell? I told him to stick with you and make sure you had fun.” “Why? Leave him to babysit me so you can go off and recreate the Grind On Me Vines?” Eddie rolls his eyes and looks away. **********  Eddie’s jealous of Buck dancing with somebody else at the club. Based off of the stills released for 9x7.

entry.title: baby, where the hell is my husband (what is taking him so long?)
entry.summary:
Author: queerbaited_by_ABC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,599Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 142

Summary: "Hey, thing two!" Chim calls out from the patio doors, pointing back out to the backyard. "Can you come over here and rescue thing one from the girls? Bobby says he hasn't had any food yet and I'm not willing to get in between Buck and his uncle time." Chimney air-quotes, exasperated. Eddie scoffs, rolling his eyes. "Why am I thing two?" He asks, offended, though Eddies filling up a second plate the moment Maddie hands him one. His own plate is abandoned, baked goods laid to the side. "Shouldn't it be the other way around?" Chimney shrugs. "Eh details, Buck joined the 118 first—and I'm pretty sure you don't want me referring to him the way Hen does on your behalf." He teases, waggling his eyebrows. Eddie flushes, looking away from Maddies inquiring expression while he clears his throat. "Uh—yeah, yeah no, don't use that word—I'll be right there."or: living with Buck is hard to describe, the experience has Eddie feeling like he's floating on cloud nine most days, but when the new HOA president, Jason, wages war with Eddie about the mango tree in their front yard (Bucks mango tree, to be specific), well, it’s only natural that Eddie ends up proposing marriage about it.

entry.title: Eddie Diaz Picks a Book
entry.summary:
Author: CourtepointeClementine

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,783Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: “Eddie,” Maddie says. “I know our kids are different ages, and our situations are different, but — it kind of sounds like you need something else besides your kid and work, too.” Well, I used to have a best friend, Eddie thinks, then pushes the thought away. “I … I have other things. But Chris and the job are definitely the most central right now.” "You know, you can’t put yourself last all the time, Eddie.” She laughs a little. “Straight from my therapist’s mouth to your ears! Ooh — you know what? I’ve got a great idea.” “Oh?” “You should come to book club. It’s this thing I do with my parent friends. We take turns hosting, and it’s my turn!”Sometimes the best part about reading is getting to learn more about yourself.

entry.title: I know they're losing (and I'll pay for my place by the ring)
entry.summary:
Author: funnyfeelingbuckley

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,632Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 37

Summary: It started as an outlet, at first. A way to let out his anger in a controlled manner, with a willing opponent who would offer him the pain that he deserved. He felt itchy. Teen pregnancy in a Catholic household had cloaked him with such a thick layer of shame that he needed a way to forget. It was a good thing, he tells himself. It was an honest thing - born out of good intentions. Until it wasn't. - Or Instead of enlisting in the military, Eddie makes money via an underground fight club in Texas. After threats against his family are leveled, Eddie finds a way to Los Angeles with the help of Athena Grant. Now working as private security, he begins working for Evan "Buck" Buckley, an arrogant and hot-headed singer/songwriter who may just give Eddie Diaz a run for his money.   title based on I Bet On Losing Dogs by Mitski

Eddie knows Buck, and Buck? Definitely got laid. "I slept with both of them," Buck says, testing out his glove where Ravi tightened it for him, like those words have any context for Eddie. entry.title: fly me to the moon
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,571Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 372

Summary: Buck is about to walk out of the airport. He can’t do this. He won’t. But then a hand—a big, warm hand—settles on his shoulder. “Hey, uh—” Buck turns, and standing there is the most beautiful man Buck’s seen in his entire life. A week’s worth of stubble across his jaw and cheek, a strong nose, and the deepest, prettiest brown eyes he’s ever seen, framed by mile-long lashes. Buck’s breath catches. Buck’s not into men, but holy shit, if he was—he’d be into this guy. Well. He is kinda into this guy. Well. That’s— “I’m here with my kid,” the guy continues, throwing a thumb over his shoulder and pointing toward where a blonde-haired, smiling kid with red glasses and crutches is standing. The kid lifts a hand and waves. Okay. Even if Buck is into the guy—kid usually means wife. Damn. “He’s got CP. We’ve done this song and dance a thousand times. You want a hand?” “Sir,” the man cuts in, “this is a private discussion—” Buck, who really was trying not to cry before, feels like he’s fighting a losing battle now. His eyes are a little wet, and his hands, gripping his crutches, are shaking just a little. “Fuck. Yeah. Please.”OR Eddie Diaz vs American Airlines.

entry.title: Your Chains are Forged
entry.summary:
Author: blackrose_17

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,347Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 63

Summary: Edmundo paid no attention to them as he looked out the window up towards the moon, where he could see a thin veil that connected the world of the living and the dead. “Tonight is a night of magic. Where those gone may visit their loved ones. And for those who are in endless torment, try and do good to remove a chain or two.” Edmundo turned to look at them. “They always fail.” Climbing to his feet, he approached his son and daughter-in-law. “Tonight you will be visited by three ghosts. Christopher is in El Paso, and Helena believes she has won, but the spirits that appear at Christmas will not let her win. It is time for the Diaz parents to either change or keep forging the chains they have already made.

entry.title: Fault Lines
entry.summary:
Author: themrscevans

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,381Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Ava Rousseau never meant to fall for one firefighter — let alone two. What begins as reluctant friendship deepens into something raw and unshakable: love in the wreckage, trust forged in fire. But fault lines don’t ask permission before they break, and between ER chaos, unspoken confessions, and scars that refuse to fade, Ava learns the fiercest battles aren’t fought in the field — they’re fought inside your own chest.

entry.title: etsy witches are 'sometimes' the solution
entry.summary:
Author: sincerelyausten

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,222Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: Eddie Diaz is not superstitious, but he is deeply annoyed by Tommy and extremely fond of Buck. What starts as a harmless joke involving a single Etsy spell spirals into candles, jars, and increasingly specific acts of cosmic inconvenience. Somewhere between accidental witchcraft and emotional overinvestment, Eddie realizes this was never just about hexing Tommy—it was about how much he cares about Buck. OR:Eddie buys an Etsy witch to hex Tommy. This turns out to be the least complicated part of the situation.
